title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses why last night's MLB All Star game was a good night for baseball. USA Today columnist Dan Wolken shares his thoughts on the future of conferences in College Football Plus, ESPN NBA reporter Dave McMenamin explains why KD and Kyrie may stay in Brooklyn next season after all.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
